img_above_text:
![Wukong Thunderclap 94.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/02/Wukong_Thunderclap_94.jpg)
Another new move he can perform when jumping on his blade will be to launch himself into the air instead of slashing with it, which will expel a handful of projectiles feathers from his wings that will fly down at you quickly after hanging in the air for a moment. If you have the time, you can spin your staff, or just simply dodge as they will all reach you at the same moment.
img_below_text:
After you've defeated his clones and beaten the Macaque Chief one final time, the Destined One will stand victorious, but the evil energies of the seed sack will warp your mind, transforming you into that which you have sought to defeat!
Macaque Chief (Mahavira Hall)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Thunderclap 94.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/02/Wukong_Thunderclap_94.jpg)
Another new move he can perform when jumping on his blade will be to launch himself into the air instead of slashing with it, which will expel a handful of projectiles feathers from his wings that will fly down at you quickly after hanging in the air for a moment. If you have the time, you can spin your staff, or just simply dodge as they will all reach you at the same moment."
        - Following Text: "After you've defeated his clones and beaten the Macaque Chief one final time, the Destined One will stand victorious, but the evil energies of the seed sack will warp your mind, transforming you into that which you have sought to defeat!
Macaque Chief (Mahavira Hall)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a climactic moment in *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the protagonist, Wukong, amidst a vivid, red-hued environment with intricate designs and a glowing weapon. This scene likely follows the defeat of the Macaque Chief and reflects the transformation of Wukong due to the corrupting influence of the seed sack, as described in the accompanying text.
